data: By Andreas Wiseman Andreas Wiseman Executive Editor, International & Strategy @AndreasWiseman More Stories By Andreas ‘Melania’: What The Critics Are Saying About Amazon’s Controversial Big-Budget Documentary ‘Iron Lung’ On Course To Steal The Show At UK Box Office “Proving That YouTube & Gen Z Aren’t The Death Of Cinema” Disney Pixar Film ‘Hoppers’ To Preview At New York Children’s Film Festival View All January 28, 2026 8:26am Inga Ibsdotter Lilleaas at The 16th Governors Awards. Gilbert Flores/Penske Media EXCLUSIVE : Oscar-nominated Norwegian actress Inga Ibsdotter Lilleaas has signed with CAA . Lilleaas has broken out globally thanks to her turn in Joachim Trier’s acclaimed drama Sentimental Value , recently earning her first Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress. She was also nominated for a Gotham Award, a Golden Globe, a Critics’ Choice Award and a BAFTA Award and the Best Supporting Actress honors award from the National Board of Review. In the family drama, which won the Grand Prix at Cannes, Lilleas portrays one of two sisters who reunite with their estranged father, played by Stellan Skarsgard. She previously starred opposite Christopher Nissen in Netflix’s 2023 film A Beautiful Life , which scored well on the streamer’s global charts, and in 2015, her feature debut performance in Women In Oversized Men’s Shirts saw her nominated for Norway’s Amanda Award for Best Actress. Watch on Deadline Lilleaas continues to be represented by Oriana Elia at Curtis Brown Group and Anne Ellemann at Team Players in Scandinavia.
